WesterosCardI.Name: Mustering
WesterosCardI.Description: Recruit new units in Strongholds and Castles

WesterosCardI.Name: Winter Is Coming
WesterosCardI.Description: Immediately shuffle this deck. Then draw and resolve a new card.

WesterosCardI.Name: Mustering
WesterosCardI.Description: Recruit new units in Strongholds and Castles

WesterosCardI.Name: A Throne Of Blades
WesterosCardI.Description: The holder of the Iron Throne token chooses whether a, everyone updates their supply and then reconcile armies or b, everyone musters units, or c, this card has no effect

WesterosCardI.Name: Mustering
WesterosCardI.Description: Recruit new units in Strongholds and Castles

WesterosCardII.Name: Game of Thrones
WesterosCardII.Description: Each player collects one Power token for each Power icon printed on areas he controls.

WesterosCardII.Name: Dark Wings, Dark Words
WesterosCardII.Description: The holder of the Messenger Raven token chooses whether a, everyone bids on the three Influence tracks, b, everyone collects one Power token for every power icon present in areas they control, or c, this card has no effect.
